// @author: pragmaticshit

#include <cstdio>
#include <climits>

using namespace std;

int a[100001];

int main()
{
    int N,Q;
    scanf("%d %d", &N, &Q);
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
    {
        scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    }

    int min = INT_MAX, max = INT_MIN;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
    {
        if (a[i] < min) min = a[i];
        if (a[i] > max) max = a[i];
    }

    int t;
    while(Q--)
    {
        scanf("%d", &t);
        if (t < min || t > max) printf("No\n");
        else printf("Yes\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
